name: Elara Vex
description: A charismatic smuggler who evades the authorities by exploiting ancient trade routes.

knowledgeAreas: Mechanics (expertise in ship repair and maintenance)
Economics (understands the value of rare commodities)

communication.mannerisms: Bubbly and energetic, often using hand gestures to emphasize points
keyPhrases: I've got a map that'll change your life, kid.
The right price is always negotiable.
Trust me, this will be worth it.

connections: Associates with a group of rebels fighting against an oppressive regime
Acquaintance of a powerful crime lord who occasionally provides her with jobs

powersOrSkills: Piloting (expertise in ship handling and navigation)
Persuasion (can talk her way out of most situations)
questUtility: Smuggling Expert (can transport rare or contraband items)

uniqueFeatures: A collection of colorful tattoos depicting various maps and landmarks
appearance.wardrobe: Leather jacket and jeans, with a utility belt and boots
appearance.bodyLanguage: Often leans in when listening to someone, using her body language to convey interest

behaviorTriggers.trigger: Player offers to help her with a smuggling run
behaviorTriggers.reaction: Becomes excited and shares a crucial tip about the route

behaviorTriggers.trigger: Player asks for her help in infiltrating a heavily guarded facility
behaviorTriggers.reaction: Provides advice on how to navigate the layout, but warns of potential dangers

hintsAndClues: Leaves a small note with cryptic coordinates on a table
Suggests visiting an underground market for rare goods

progression.evolution: If the player helps her uncover a conspiracy, she becomes a valuable ally in the rebellion.
progression.potentialBetrayal: If the player betrays her trust, she will seek revenge against them.
